format:
<script>
(function(scope) {
    scope.$watch('msg.payload', function(data) {
        if(data === "redirect") {
          // console.log("AAAA", data);
          window.location.href = "http://192.168.0.69:5001/video_feed";
        }
    });
})(scope);
</script>
